question: Which bank is to work on infrastructure creation to improve coastal shipping in India?
explanation: The Minister of State for Shipping (I/C) and Chemical & Fertilizers Shri Mansukh Mandaviya informed that an Action Plan for Coastal Shipping has been prepared by the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in September 2019. This action plan includes recommendations concerning infrastructure creation required to increase the use of coastal shipping in India.The Minister informed that the Master Planning of 12 Major Ports has been carried out and 95 capacity expansion and port modernization projects have been identified. Major ports capacity has been re-rated concerning global benchmarks as per berthing policy 2016 and effective capacity has increased by 293 MTPA after re-rating. Global benchmarks have been adopted to improve the efficiency and productivity of major ports and 116 initiatives have been identified to unlock 100 MTPA of capacity at major ports.
